column1: Smoque BBQ////From the very beginning Smoque made everything so easy. It's hard to find a place that will deliver to the suburbs
column2: but I called and discussed how much food they thought I'd need and worked with me without any problems. When I called a couple weeks later to say that our guest count had gone down they had no problem reducing the amount of food I ordered. I even told them that I didn't want to use their buns and they were fine with that and suggested how much I should get to make sure I had enough.
